fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Shoot someone at night, directly attacking them (4 charges).
- Go on alert at night, this works like a classic Vet alert (3 charges). You will destroy the wills of your victims.
- Set up a bomb at someone's house (3 charges).
- Detonate a bomb you placed on a previous night, killing the house's owner and all their visitors (3 charges).
- Reload, gaining a new charge of an ability of choice.
- Go out with a bang at night, killing yourself, your target and everyone who visits them. If you manage to survive using it, this has infinite charges.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You may only use one ability at a time.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be the leading cause of death once the game is over, whether you survived or not.
